When using 
Advanced Logic
 or 
Visibility Condition
, you may wish to restrict based on the category ID of the current 
user
's organization.
The syntax of the conditional statements refers to the 
categoryid
, which is the system's numerical value associated with each 
category
. 
Categories
 are to organizations in SmartSimple what 
roles
 are to users/contacts.
In order to determine the 
categoryid
:
 Open the profile page for an organization that has the relevant 
category
.
 Hover your cursor over the relevant category:
A message will display at the bottom left of the page containing the category ID.
